title: Getting COVID Ruined Everything
description:
Lauren contracts COVID’s favorite new variant which consequently cancels Christmas and Jeremy’s first day celebrating the biggest deal he’s ever closed. Jeremy’s dirty 30 approaches and Lauren preps to go back to Canada.

As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at https://BetterHelp.com/wt9
For a limited time, try the Peloton App free for 2 months, then $12.99/month after. New Members only. Visit https://onepeloton.com/app to learn more.
Don’t fall for subscription scams. Start cancelling today at https://Truebill.com/WILD.
Get started today by filling out your style quiz at https://StitchFix.com/Wild9
Sign up takes only two minutes and doesn’t affect your credit score. Get started at https://chime.com/wt9. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
